articles.author: Christopher Lewis
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast – Gold Continues to Look For Floor - FX Empire
articles.description: The gold market has pulled back just a bit for the bulk of the session in the early hours of Thursday, as the market will continue to see a lot of external noise.
articles.content: Gold fell a bit during the course of the trading session on Thursday as we continue to see a lot of negativity. That being said though, we are also supported right around the $2,300 level. In general… [+834 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Butcher
articles.title: Fired 33-year-old SocGen trader says he was expecting a $1m bonus - eFinancialCareers
articles.description: When you're suddenly rendered homeless and unemployed.
articles.content: Eight months ago, life was good for Kavish Kataria, the 33-year-old former SocGen vice president at the centre of the French bank's latest trading brouhaha. Based in Hong Kong on the delta one desk, … [+2851 chars]
